amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language prohibiting the use of funds to conduct indoor air pollution research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 8 in the Congressional Record of October 10, 1995, to strike the language bill prohibiting any funds authorized in the bill from being used to conduct indoor air pollution research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 218 (Roll no. 710).
